title: Login button not responding on mobile devices
description:
The login button becomes unresponsive on mobile devices after the recent update. Users are unable to tap the button to proceed with authentication. This affects iOS Safari and Chrome browsers on mobile.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application on a mobile device
2. Navigate to the login page
3. Enter valid credentials
4. Tap the login button
5. Button does not respond

Expected: Login process should proceed normally
Actual: Button appears frozen and unresponsive

title: Database connection timeout during peak hours
description:
Users are experiencing slow loading times and connection timeouts during peak business hours (9 AM - 5 PM EST). This is affecting approximately 30% of users and causing significant performance degradation.

Error logs show connection pool exhaustion and query timeouts exceeding 30 seconds. The issue appears to be related to increased traffic load without proper scaling mechanisms in place.

title: Add dark mode theme option
description:
Users have requested a dark mode theme option to reduce eye strain during nighttime usage. This feature should include:

- Toggle switch in user preferences
- System preference detection (auto-switch based on OS setting)
- Consistent dark theme across all application pages
- Proper contrast ratios for accessibility compliance
- Smooth transition animations between themes

This enhancement would improve user experience and align with modern application standards.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description:
The email notification system has stopped working since yesterday. Users are not receiving:

- Password reset emails
- Account verification emails
- System alerts and updates
- Weekly summary reports

SMTP logs show authentication failures and the email queue is backing up. This is a critical system function that needs immediate attention.

title: Improve search functionality with filters
description:
Current search functionality is limited and users have requested enhanced filtering capabilities:

- Date range filters
- Category-based filtering
- Sort by relevance, date, popularity
- Advanced search with boolean operators
- Search result highlighting
- Save search preferences

This would significantly improve user productivity and content discoverability.

title: Security vulnerability in file upload
description:
Security audit revealed that the file upload functionality does not properly validate file types and sizes. Potential risks include:

- Unrestricted file type uploads
- No virus scanning
- Insufficient file size limits
- Directory traversal vulnerabilities
- Executable file uploads

This needs immediate attention to prevent potential security breaches.

title: Dashboard widgets loading slowly
description:
Dashboard widgets are taking 5-8 seconds to load, significantly impacting user experience. The delay appears to be related to:

- Multiple database queries running synchronously
- Large datasets being loaded without pagination
- Inefficient chart rendering
- Missing caching mechanisms

Users expect dashboard to load within 2-3 seconds maximum.

title: Add export functionality for reports
description:
Users need the ability to export reports in multiple formats:

- PDF export with formatting
- Excel/CSV for data analysis
- Print-friendly versions
- Scheduled report generation
- Custom report templates

This feature is essential for users who need to share reports with stakeholders or conduct offline analysis.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description:
Mobile application is crashing immediately after launch on Android devices running OS version 12 and above. Crash logs indicate:

- Memory allocation failures
- Incompatible native library versions
- Startup sequence timeout
- Manifest permission issues

This affects approximately 40% of our mobile user base and requires urgent resolution.

title: Implement user role management system
description:
Need to implement a comprehensive role-based access control system:

- Admin, Manager, User, and Guest roles
- Permission-based feature access
- Role assignment interface
- Audit logging for role changes
- Integration with existing authentication

This will provide better security and allow for more granular control over application features.
